DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study evaluate usability Mesotest II assessment night drive capacity pseudo-phakic patient implant aspheric monofocal posterior chamber IOL *AT.Smart 46LC . Target Criterion : Measurement contrast sensitivity sensitivity light mesopic condition ( Mesotest II , Oculus ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy eye cataract Patient age 5075 year Written Patient Informed Consent Assured followup examination Any kind macula degeneration impairment retina ( clinical diagnosis ) Amblyopia Intraoperative complication ; damage posterior bag ; intraocular haemorrhage Astigmatism > 1.5 D ( objective , preoperative ) Pregnancy lactation period female patient
DOC.keyword: Evaluation usability Mesotest II assessment night drive capacity pseudo-phakic patient
